column4: anyone know why downloading packages from sg.archive.ubuntuforum.com is so slow...? i am getting 5000 - 800b/s when i used to get 30kb/s
he is probably receiving too much traffic. Try another mirror for a while.

in the System > Administration there is a item called 'Software Channels' or something like that. Inside it there is the possibility of testing the speed of all mirrors to select a better option for you.
